sentences.en: "He went back to the lab", Iris exclaimed impatiently.
sentences.cn: “他回实验室去了，”艾里斯不耐烦地大声说。

sentences.en: Actually, the biometric sensor doesn't read the iris.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 生物感应器不会读取虹膜.

sentences.en: All the iris have popped open, and the smell is sheer heaven.
sentences.cn: 所有的蝴蝶花全盛开了, 那股香味简直妙不可言.

sentences.en: And it is abIe to control the iris.
sentences.cn: 那么他就有能力去控制虹膜进口.

sentences.en: Experimental results for both Iris data and Wine data verify the validity of our method.
sentences.cn: Iris数据,Wine数据的实验结果都验证了新方法的可行性.

sentences.en: Immediately behind the iris is the crystalline lens.
sentences.cn: 紧靠着虹膜后面的是水晶体(眼球).

sentences.en: In addition, comparison with fuzzy Kohonen clustering networks ( FKCN ) also been made, based on IRIS data.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还基于IRIS数据集比较了该算法与FKCN模糊自主聚类算法.

sentences.en: Iris finally ordered coffees for herself and Tania.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯最后为自己和塔妮娅点了咖啡。

sentences.en: IRIS is an answer to these problems.
sentences.cn: IRIS就是解决这些问题的答案.

sentences.en: Iris Murdoch was regarded by many as a supremely good and serious writer.
sentences.cn: 许多人都视艾丽丝·默多克为极其优秀和严肃的作家。

sentences.en: The iris is fixed to the ciliary body.
The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的虹膜最远可在一公尺外的距离接受摄影。

sentences.en: The opening of the iris is called the pupil.
sentences.cn: 虹膜的开口处叫做瞳孔.

sentences.en: The patterns of the iris are translated into digital code, and stored in a PC database, along with personal information.
sentences.cn: 虹膜的图案转译为数码，然后与个人资料一起储存在个人计算机数据库里。

sentences.en: The structure of the iris will also modify the shade.
sentences.cn: 虹膜的结构也能影响眼睛的深浅.

sentences.en: This gives the muscles of your lens and iris a chance to shift position.
sentences.cn: 这就给你眼球的晶体肌和虹膜肌有换位置的机会.

sentences.en: This small move creates better balance with the iris and pupil of each eye and eliminates the tension on the left eye against the left edge of her face.
sentences.cn: 这样小小的移动创造了更好的平衡，包括虹膜、瞳孔和每一只眼睛，消除了左眼对她脸部边缘的压迫感。

sentences.en: We can offer you internationally recognized certification according to IRIS.
sentences.cn: 我们将提供具有国际公信力的IRIS认证.

phrases.tran_cn: 彩虹光圈；[摄]可变光圈（等于iris）

trans.tran_en: the round coloured part of your eye, that surrounds the black  pupil
